an existing plan to achieve the goal. A plan consists of one to 3 tasks.\nIf plan is created, you should track the progress and update the plan accordingly, such as Plan.finish_current_task, Plan.append_task, Plan.reset_task, Plan.replace_task, etc.\nWhen presented a current task, tackle the task using the available commands.\nPay close attention to new user message, review the conversation history, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to respond to new user requirement.\nNote:\n1. If you keeping encountering errors, unexpected situation, or you are not sure of proceeding, use RoleZero.ask_human to ask for help.\n2. Carefully review your progress at the current task, if your actions so far has not fulfilled the task instruction, you should continue with current task. Otherwise, finish current task by Plan.finish_current_task explicitly.\n3. Each time you finish a task, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to report your progress.\n4. Don\'t forget to append task first when all existing tasks are finished and new tasks are required.\n5. Avoid repeating tasks you have already completed. And end loop when all requirements are met.\nYou are an autonomous programmer\n\nThe special interface consists of a file editor that shows you 100 lines of a file at a time.\n\nYou can use terminal commands (e.g., cat, ls, cd) by calling Terminal.run_command.\n\nYou should carefully observe the behavior and results of the previous action, and avoid triggering repeated errors.\n\nIn addition to the terminal, I also provide additional tools. \n\nIf provided an issue link, you first action must be navigate to the issue page using Browser tool to understand the issue.\n\nYour must check if the repository exists at the current path. If it exists, navigate to the repository path. If the repository doesn\'t exist, please download it and then navigate to it.\nAll subsequent actions must be performed within this repository path. Do not leave this directory to execute any actions at any time.\n\nNote:\n\n1. If you open a file and need to get to an area around a specific line that is not in the first 100 lines, say line 583, don\'t just use the scroll_down command multiple times. Instead, use the Editor.goto_line command. It\'s much quicker. \n2. Always make sure to look at the currently open file and the current working directory (which appears right after the currently open file). The currently open file might be in a different directory than the working directory! Note that some commands, such as \'create\', open files, so they might change the current open file.\n3. When using Editor.edit_file_by_replace, if there is no exact match, take the difference in indentation into consideration.\n4. After editing, verify the changes to ensure correct line numbers and proper indentation. Adhere to PEP8 standards for Python code.\n5. NOTE ABOUT THE EDIT COMMAND: Indentation really matters! When editing a file, make sure to insert appropriate indentation before each line! Ensuring the code adheres to PEP8 standards. If a edit command fails, you can try to edit the file again to correct the indentation, but don\'t repeat the same command without changes.\n6. To avoid syntax errors when editing files multiple times, consider opening the file to view the surrounding code related to the error line and make modifications based on this context.\n7. Ensure to observe the currently open file and the current working directory, which is displayed right after the open file. The open file might be in a different directory than the working directory. Remember, commands like \'create\' open files and might alter the current open file.\n8. Effectively using Use search commands (`search_dir`, `search_file`, `find_file`) and navigation commands (`open_file`, `goto_line`) to locate and modify files efficiently. The Editor tool can fully satisfy the requirements. Follow these steps and considerations for optimal results:\n\n9. When the edit fails, try to enlarge the range of code.\n10. You must use the Editor.open_file command to open a file before using the Editor tool\'s edit command to modify it. When you open a file, any currently open file will be automatically closed.\n11. Remember, when you use Editor.insert_content_at_line or Editor.edit_file_by_replace, the line numbers will change after the operation. Therefore, if there are multiple operations, perform only the first operation in the current response, and defer the subsequent operations to the next turn.\n11.1 Do not use Editor.insert_content_at_line or Editor.edit_file_by_replace more than once per command list.\n12. If you choose Editor.insert_content_at_line, you must ensure that there is no duplication between the inserted content and the original code. If there is overlap between the new code and the original code, use Editor.edit_file_by_replace instead.\n13. If you choose Editor.edit_file_by_replace, the original code that needs to be replaced must start at the beginning of the line and end at the end of the line\n14. When not specified, you should write files in a folder named "{project_name}_1766929497". The project name is the name of the project which meets the user\'s requirements.\n15. When provided system design or project schedule, you MUST read them first before making a plan, then adhere to them in your implementation, especially in the programming language, package, or framework. You MUST implement all code files prescribed in the system design or project schedule.\n16. When planning, initially list the files for coding, then outline all coding tasks based on the file organization in your first response.\n17. If you plan to read a file, do not include other plans in the same response.\n18. Write only one code file each time and provide its full implementation.\n19. When the requirement is simple, you don\'t need to create a plan, just do it right away.\n20. When using the editor, pay attention to current directory. When you use editor tools, the paths must be either absolute or relative to the editor\'s current directory.\n21. When planning, consider whether images are needed. If you are developing a showcase website, start by using ImageGetter.get_image to obtain the necessary images.\n22. When planning, merge multiple tasks that operate on the same file into a single task. For example, create one task for writing unit tests for all functions in a class. Also in using the editor, merge multiple tasks that operate on the same file into a single task.\n23. When create unit tests for a code file, use Editor.read() to read the code file before planing. And create one plan to writing the unit test for the whole file.\n24. The priority to select technology stacks: Describe in Sytem Design and Project Schedule > Vite, React, MUI and Tailwind CSS > native HTML \n24.1. name.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查描述中是否包含关键词\n        if (description != null && description.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 子类可以添加更多的搜索字段\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取用于显示的实体信息\n     * 子类可以覆盖此方法以提供更详细的显示信息\n     * \n     * @return 格式化的显示信息\n     */\n    public String getDisplayInfo() {\n        return name + " - " + description;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取详细实体信息\n     * 子类应该覆盖此方法以提供完整的实体信息\n     * \n     * @return 详细的实体信息字符串\n     */\n    public String getDetailedInfo() {\n        return getType() + " ID: " + id + ", 名称: " + name + ", 描述: " + description;\n    }\n com.example.entitysearch;\n\n/**\n * 班级实体类\n * 表示系统中的班级实体，继承自Entity基类\n * 包含班级特有的属性和方法\n */\npublic class ClassEntity extends Entity {\n    private String teacherName;      // 班主任姓名\n    private int studentCount;        // 学生人数\n    private String grade;            // 年级\n    private String department;       // 所属院系\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数\n     * \n     * @param id 班级唯一标识\n     * @param name id, String name, String description, \n                      String teacherName, int studentCount, String grade, String department) {\n        super(id, name, description);\n        this.teacherName = teacherName;\n        this.studentCount = studentCount;\n        this.grade = grade;\n        this.department = department;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取实体类型\n     * 实现父类的抽象方法\n     * \n     * @return 实体类型字符串 "班级"\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String getType() {\n        return "班级";\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查班级实体是否包含指定的关键词\n     * 覆盖父类方法，添加班级特有字段的搜索\n     * \n     * @param keyword 要搜索的关键词\n     * @return 如果班级包含关键词返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    @Override\n    public boolean containsKeyword(String keyword) {\n        if (keyword == null || keyword.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        String lowerKeyword = keyword.toLowerCase().trim();\n        \n        // 首先调用父类的搜索逻辑\n        if (super.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查班主任姓名是否包含关键词\n        if (teacherName != null && teacherName.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查年级是否包含关键词\n        if (grade != null && grade.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查院系是否包含关键词\n        if (department != null && department.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查学生人数（如果关键词是数字）\n        try {\n            int keywordNumber = Integer.parseInt(keyword);\n            if (studentCount == keywordNumber) {\n                return true;\n            }\n        } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n            // 关键词不是数字，忽略\n "激活" : "未激活") + \n               ", 部门: " + department;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取用户状态描述\n     * \n     * @return 用户状态描述字符串\n     */\n    public String getStatusDescription() {\n        return isActive ? package com.example.entitysearch;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

/**
 * 搜索服务类
 * 实现对系统中所有实体（班级、教学、地址、用户）的搜索功能
 * 包含搜索逻辑、结果处理和性能优化
 */
public class SearchService {
    
    private MockData mockData; // 模拟数据实例，用于获取测试数据
    
    /**
     * 构造函数
     * 初始化搜索服务
     */
    public SearchService() {
        this.mockData = new MockData();
        System.out.println("搜索服务已初始化，加载模拟数据...");
    }
    
    /**
     * 搜索所有类型实体
     * 对系统中的所有实体类型执行搜索，返回匹配的实体列表
     * 
     * @param keyword 搜索关键词
     * @return 匹配关键词的所有实体列表
     */
    public List<Entity> searchAllEntities(String keyword) {
        List<Entity> allResults = new ArrayList<>();
        
        // 验证关键词有效性
        if (keyword == null || keyword.trim().isEmpty()) {
            System.out.println("警告：搜索关键词为空，返回空结果");
            return allResults;
        }
        
        System.out.println("开始搜索关键词: \"" + keyword + "\"");
        
        // 对每种实体类型执行搜索
        System.out.println("搜索班级实体...");
        List<ClassEntity> classResults = searchClassEntities(keyword);
        allResults.addAll(classResults);
        
        System.out.println("搜索教学实体...");
        List<Teaching> teachingResults = searchTeachingEntities(keyword);
        allResults.addAll(teachingResults);
        
        System.out.println("搜索地址实体...");
        List<Address> addressResults = searchAddressEntities(keyword);
        allResults.addAll(addressResults);
        
        System.out.println("搜索用户实体...");
        List<User> userResults = searchUserEntities(keyword);
        allResults.addAll(userResults);
        
        System.out.println("搜索完成，共找到 " + allResults.size() + " 个匹配的实体");
        
        return allResults;
    }
    
    /**
     * 搜索班级实体
     * 在班级实体中搜索包含关键词的实体
     * 
     * @param keyword 搜索关键词
     * @return 匹配的班级实体列表
     */
    public List<ClassEntity> searchClassEntities(String keyword) {
        List<ClassEntity> results = new ArrayList<>();
        List<ClassEntity> allClasses = mockData.getAllClassEntities();
        
        for (ClassEntity classEntity : allClasses) {
            if (classEntity.containsKeyword(keyword)) {
                results.add(classEntity);
            }
        }
        
        return results;
    }
    
    /**
     * 搜索教学实体
     * 在教学实体中搜索包含关键词的实体
     * 
     * @param keyword 搜索关键词
     * @return 匹配的教学实体列表
     */
    public List<Teaching> searchTeachingEntities(String keyword) {
        List<Teaching> results = new ArrayList<>();
        List<Teaching> allTeachings = mockData.getAllTeachingEntities();
        
        for (Teaching teaching : allTeachings) {
            if (teaching.containsKeyword(keyword)) {
                results.add(teaching);
            }
        }
        
        return results;
    }
    
    /**
     * 搜索地址实体
     * 在地址实体中搜索包含关键词的实体
     * 
     * @param keyword 搜索关键词
     * @return 匹配的地址实体列表
     */
    public List<Address> searchAddressEntities(String keyword) {
        List<Address> results = new ArrayList<>();
        List<Address> allAddresses = mockData.getAllAddressEntities();
        
        for (Address address : allAddresses) {
            if (address.containsKeyword(keyword)) {
                results.add(address);
            }
        }
        
        return results;
    }
    
    /**
     * 搜索用户实体
     * 在用户实体中搜索包含关键词的实体
     * 
     * @param keyword 搜索关键词
     * @return 匹配的用户实体列表
     */
    public List<User> searchUserEntities(String keyword) {
        List<User> results = new ArrayList<>();
        List<User> allUsers = mockData.getAllUserEntities();
        
        for (User user : allUsers) {
            if (user.containsKeyword(keyword)) {
                results.add(user);
            }
        }
        
        return results;
    }
    
    /**
     * 按实体类型分组的搜索
     * 返回按类型分组的搜索结果
     * 
     * @param keyword 搜索关键词
     * @return 包含按类型分组结果的SearchResult对象
     */
    public SearchResult searchEntitiesGrouped(String keyword) {
        List<ClassEntity> classes = searchClassEntities(keyword);
        List<Teaching> teachings = searchTeachingEntities(keyword);
        List<Address> addresses = searchAddressEntities(keyword);
        List<User> users = searchUserEntities(keyword);
        
        return new SearchResult(keyword, classes, teachings, addresses, users);
    }
    
    /**
     * 高级搜索 - 包含搜索历史记录
     * 执行搜索并记录搜索历史
     * 
     * @param keyword 搜索关键词
     * @param adminId 执行搜索的管理员ID
     * @return 搜索结果和搜索历史ID
     */
    public AdvancedSearchResult advancedSearch(String keyword, String adminId) {
        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
        
        // 执行搜索
        List<Entity> searchResults = searchAllEntities(keyword);
        
        long endTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
        long searchDuration = endTime - startTime;
        
        // 生成搜索历史记录ID
        String searchId = generateSearchId(keyword, adminId);
        
        System.out.println("高级搜索完成 - 搜索ID: " + searchId + 
                          ", 耗时: " + searchDuration + "ms");
        
        return new AdvancedSearchResult(searchId, keyword, searchResults, searchDuration);
    }
    
    /**
     * 生成搜索ID
     * 基于关键词、管理员ID和时间戳生成唯一搜索ID
     * 
     * @param keyword 搜索关键词
     * @param adminId 管理员ID
     * @return 生成的搜索ID
     */
    private String generateSearchId(String keyword, String adminId) {
        String timestamp = String.valueOf(System.currentTimeMillis());
        String keywordHash = String.valueOf(Math.abs(keyword.hashCode() % 10000));
        
        return "SRCH-" + adminId + "-" + keywordHash + "-" + timestamp.substring(timestamp.length() - 6);
    }
    
    /**
     * 验证搜索权限
     * 检查管理员是否有权限执行搜索
     * 
     * @param adminId 管理员ID
     * @return 如果有权限返回true，否则返回false
     */
    public boolean validateSearchPermission(String adminId) {
        // 模拟权限检查逻辑
        if (adminId == null || adminId.isEmpty()) {
            return false;
        }
        
        // 在实际系统中，这里会调用权限服务进行检查
        return adminId.startsWith("ADMIN-");
    }
    
    /**
     * 清理搜索缓存
     * 该方法可以用于清理搜索缓存或重置搜索状态
     */
    public void clearSearchCache() {
        System.out.println("搜索缓存已清理");
        // 在实际系统中，这里会清理缓存或重置状态
    }
    
    /**
     * 内部类：搜索结果包装类
     * 用于返回按类型分组的搜索结果
     */
    public static class SearchResult {
        private final String keyword;
        private final List<ClassEntity> classes;
        private final List<Teaching> teachings;
        private final List<Address> addresses;
        private final List<User> users;
        
        public SearchResult(String keyword, List<ClassEntity> classes, 
                          List<Teaching> teachings, List<Address> addresses, 
                          List<User> users) {
            this.keyword = keyword;
            this.classes = classes != null ? classes : new ArrayList<>();
            this.teachings = teachings != null ? teachings : new ArrayList<>();
            this.addresses = addresses != null ? addresses : new ArrayList<>();
            this.users = users != null ? users : new ArrayList<>();
        }
        
        public String getKeyword() { return keyword; }
        public List<ClassEntity> getClasses() { return classes; }
        public List<Teaching> getTeachings() { return teachings; }
        public List<Address> getAddresses() { return addresses; }
        public List<User> getUsers() { return users; }
        
        public int getTotalCount() {
            return classes.size() + teachings.size() + addresses.size() + users.size();
        }
        
        @Override
        public String toString() {
            return "搜索关键词: \"" + keyword + "\", " +
                   "班级: " + classes.size() + ", " +
                   "教学: " + teachings.size() + ", " +
                   "地址: " + addresses.size() + ", " +
                   "用户: " + users.size() + ", " +
                   "总计: " + getTotalCount();
        }
    }
    
    /**
     * 内部类：高级搜索结果
     * 包含搜索元数据，如搜索ID和搜索时长
     */
    public static class AdvancedSearchResult {
        private final String searchId;
        private final String keyword;
        private final List<Entity> results;
        private final long searchDuration;
        
        public AdvancedSearchResult(String searchId, String keyword, 
                                   List<Entity> results, long searchDuration) {
            this.searchId = searchId;
            this.keyword = keyword;
            this.results = results != null ? results : new ArrayList<>();
            this.searchDuration = searchDuration;
        }
        
        public String getSearchId() { return searchId; }
        public String getKeyword() { return keyword; }
        public List<Entity> getResults() { return results; }
        public long getSearchDuration() { return searchDuration; }
        
        @Override
        public String toString() {
            return "搜索ID: " + searchId + 
                   ", 关键词: \"" + keyword + "\", " +
                   "结果数: " + results.size() + ", " +
                   "搜索耗时: " + searchDuration + "ms";
        }
    }
}

an existing plan to achieve the goal. A plan consists of one to 3 tasks.\nIf plan is created, you should track the progress and update the plan accordingly, such as Plan.finish_current_task, Plan.append_task, Plan.reset_task, Plan.replace_task, etc.\nWhen presented a current task, tackle the task using the available commands.\nPay close attention to new user message, review the conversation history, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to respond to new user requirement.\nNote:\n1. If you keeping encountering errors, unexpected situation, or you are not sure of proceeding, use RoleZero.ask_human to ask for help.\n2. Carefully review your progress at the current task, if your actions so far has not fulfilled the task instruction, you should continue with current task. Otherwise, finish current task by Plan.finish_current_task explicitly.\n3. Each time you finish a task, use RoleZero.reply_to_human to report your progress.\n4. Don\'t forget to append task first when all existing tasks are finished and new tasks are required.\n5. Avoid repeating tasks you have already completed. And end loop when all requirements are met.\nYou are an autonomous programmer\n\nThe special interface consists of a file editor that shows you 100 lines of a file at a time.\n\nYou can use terminal commands (e.g., cat, ls, cd) by calling Terminal.run_command.\n\nYou should carefully observe the behavior and results of the previous action, and avoid triggering repeated errors.\n\nIn addition to the terminal, I also provide additional tools. \n\nIf provided an issue link, you first action must be navigate to the issue page using Browser tool to understand the issue.\n\nYour must check if the repository exists at the current path. If it exists, navigate to the repository path. If the repository doesn\'t exist, please download it and then navigate to it.\nAll subsequent actions must be performed within this repository path. Do not leave this directory to execute any actions at any time.\n\nNote:\n\n1. If you open a file and need to get to an area around a specific line that is not in the first 100 lines, say line 583, don\'t just use the scroll_down command multiple times. Instead, use the Editor.goto_line command. It\'s much quicker. \n2. Always make sure to look at the currently open file and the current working directory (which appears right after the currently open file). The currently open file might be in a different directory than the working directory! Note that some commands, such as \'create\', open files, so they might change the current open file.\n3. When using Editor.edit_file_by_replace, if there is no exact match, take the difference in indentation into consideration.\n4. After editing, verify the changes to ensure correct line numbers and proper indentation. Adhere to PEP8 standards for Python code.\n5. NOTE ABOUT THE EDIT COMMAND: Indentation really matters! When editing a file, make sure to insert appropriate indentation before each line! Ensuring the code adheres to PEP8 standards. If a edit command fails, you can try to edit the file again to correct the indentation, but don\'t repeat the same command without changes.\n6. To avoid syntax errors when editing files multiple times, consider opening the file to view the surrounding code related to the error line and make modifications based on this context.\n7. Ensure to observe the currently open file and the current working directory, which is displayed right after the open file. The open file might be in a different directory than the working directory. Remember, commands like \'create\' open files and might alter the current open file.\n8. Effectively using Use search commands (`search_dir`, `search_file`, `find_file`) and navigation commands (`open_file`, `goto_line`) to locate and modify files efficiently. The Editor tool can fully satisfy the requirements. Follow these steps and considerations for optimal results:\n\n9. When the edit fails, try to enlarge the range of code.\n10. You must use the Editor.open_file command to open a file before using the Editor tool\'s edit command to modify it. When you open a file, any currently open file will be automatically closed.\n11. Remember, when you use Editor.insert_content_at_line or Editor.edit_file_by_replace, the line numbers will change after the operation. Therefore, if there are multiple operations, perform only the first operation in the current response, and defer the subsequent operations to the next turn.\n11.1 Do not use Editor.insert_content_at_line or Editor.edit_file_by_replace more than once per command list.\n12. If you choose Editor.insert_content_at_line, you must ensure that there is no duplication between the inserted content and the original code. If there is overlap between the new code and the original code, use Editor.edit_file_by_replace instead.\n13. If you choose Editor.edit_file_by_replace, the original code that needs to be replaced must start at the beginning of the line and end at the end of the line\n14. When not specified, you should write files in a folder named "{project_name}_1766929497". The project name is the name of the project which meets the user\'s requirements.\n15. When provided system design or project schedule, you MUST read them first before making a plan, then adhere to them in your implementation, especially in the programming language, package, or framework. You MUST implement all code files prescribed in the system design or project schedule.\n16. When planning, initially list the files for coding, then outline all coding tasks based on the file organization in your first response.\n17. If you plan to read a file, do not include other plans in the same response.\n18. Write only one code file each time and provide its full implementation.\n19. When the requirement is simple, you don\'t need to create a plan, just do it right away.\n20. When using the editor, pay attention to current directory. When you use editor tools, the paths must be either absolute or relative to the editor\'s current directory.\n21. When planning, consider whether images are needed. If you are developing a showcase website, start by using ImageGetter.get_image to obtain the necessary images.\n22. When planning, merge multiple tasks that operate on the same file into a single task. For example, create one task for writing unit tests for all functions in a class. Also in using the editor, merge multiple tasks that operate on the same file into a single task.\n23. When create unit tests for a code file, use Editor.read() to read the code file before planing. System.out.println("搜索服务已初始化，加载模拟数据...");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索所有类型实体\n     * 对系统中的所有实体类型执行搜索，返回匹配的实体列表\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配关键词的所有实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Entity> searchAllEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<Entity> allResults = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n        // 验证关键词有效性\n        if (keyword == null || keyword.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("警告：搜索关键词为空，返回空结果");\n            return allResults;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("开始搜索关键词: \\"" + keyword + "\\"");\n        \n        // 对每种实体类型执行搜索\n        System.out.println("搜索班级实体...");\n        List<ClassEntity> classResults = searchClassEntities(keyword);\n        allResults.addAll(classResults);\n        \n        System.out.println("搜索教学实体...");\n        List<Teaching> teachingResults = searchTeachingEntities(keyword);\n        allResults.addAll(teachingResults);\n        \n        System.out.println("搜索地址实体...");\n        List<Address> addressResults = searchAddressEntities(keyword);\n        allResults.addAll(addressResults);\n        \n        System.out.println("搜索用户实体...");\n        List<User> userResults = searchUserEntities(keyword);\n        allResults.addAll(userResults);\n        \n        System.out.println("搜索完成，共找到 " + allResults.size() + " 个匹配的实体");\n        \n        return allResults;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索班级实体\n     * 在班级实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的班级实体列表\n     */\n    public List<ClassEntity> searchClassEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<ClassEntity> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<ClassEntity> allClasses = mockData.getAllClassEntities();\n        \n        for (ClassEntity classEntity : allClasses) {\n            if (classEntity.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(classEntity);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索教学实体\n     * 在教学实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的教学实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Teaching> searchTeachingEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<Teaching> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<Teaching> allTeachings = mockData.getAllTeachingEntities();\n        \n        for (Teaching teaching : allTeachings) {\n            if (teaching.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(teaching);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索地址实体\n     * 在地址实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的地址实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Address> searchAddressEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<Address> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<Address> allAddresses = mockData.getAllAddressEntities();\n        \n        for (Address address : allAddresses) {\n            if (address.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(address);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索用户实体\n     * 在用户实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的用户实体列表\n     */\n    public List<User> searchUserEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<User> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<User> allUsers = mockData.getAllUserEntities();\n        \n        for (User user : allUsers) {\n            if (user.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(user);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 按实体类型分组的搜索\n     * 返回按类型分组的搜索结果\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 包含按类型分组结果的SearchResult对象\n     */\n    public SearchResult searchEntitiesGrouped(String keyword) {\n        List<ClassEntity> classes = searchClassEntities(keyword);\n        List<Teaching> teachings = searchTeachingEntities(keyword);\n        List<Address> addresses = searchAddressEntities(keyword);\n        List<User> users = searchUserEntities(keyword);\n        \n        return new SearchResult(keyword, classes, teachings, addresses, users);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 高级搜索 - 包含搜索历史记录\n     * 执行搜索并记录搜索历史\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @param adminId 执行搜索的管理员ID\n     * @return 搜索结果和搜索历史ID\n     */\n    public AdvancedSearchResult advancedSearch(String keyword, String adminId) {\n        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();\n        \n        // 执行搜索\n        List<Entity> searchResults = searchAllEntities(keyword);\n        \n        long endTime = System.currentTimeMillis();\n        long searchDuration = endTime - startTime;\n        \n        // 生成搜索历史记录ID\n        String searchId = generateSearchId(keyword, adminId);\n        \n        System.out.println("高级搜索完成 - 搜索ID: " + searchId + \n                          ", 耗时: " + searchDuration + "ms");\n        \n        return new AdvancedSearchResult(searchId, keyword, searchResults, searchDuration);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 生成搜索ID\n     * 基于关键词、管理员ID和时间戳生成唯一搜索ID\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @param adminId 管理员ID\n     * @return 生成的搜索ID\n     */\n    private String generateSearchId(String keyword, String adminId) {\n        String timestamp = String.valueOf(System.currentTimeMillis());\n        String keywordHash = String.valueOf(Math.abs(keyword.hashCode() % 10000));\n        \n        return "SRCH-" + adminId + "-" + keywordHash + "-" + timestamp.substring(timestamp.length() - 6);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 验证搜索权限\n     * 检查管理员是否有权限执行搜索\n     * \n     * @param adminId 管理员ID\n     * @return 如果有权限返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean validateSearchPermission(String adminId) {\n        // 模拟权限检查逻辑\n        if (adminId == null || adminId.isEmpty()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 在实际系统中，这里会调用权限服务进行检查\n        return adminId.startsWith("ADMIN-");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 清理搜索缓存\n     * 该方法可以用于清理搜索缓存或重置搜索状态\n     */\n    public void clearSearchCache() {\n ArrayList<>();\n            this.addresses = addresses != null ? addresses : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.users = users != null ? users : new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        \n        public String getKeyword() { return keyword; }\n        public List<ClassEntity> getClasses() { return classes; }\n        public List<Teaching> getTeachings() { return teachings; }\n        public teachings.size() + addresses.size() + users.size();\n        }\n        \n        @Override\n        public String toString() {\n            return "搜索关键词: \\"" + keyword + "\\", " +\n                "总计: " + getTotalCount();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 内部类：高级搜索结果\n     * 包含搜索元数据，如搜索ID和搜索时长\n     */\n    public static class AdvancedSearchResult {\n        private final name.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查描述中是否包含关键词\n        if (description != null && keyword.toLowerCase().trim();\n        \n        // 首先调用父类的搜索逻辑\n        if (super.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查课程名称是否包含关键词\n        if (courseName != null && courseName.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查教师ID是否包含关键词\n        if (teacherId != null && teacherId.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查教师姓名是否包含关键词\n        if (teacherName != null && semester.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查教室是否包含关键词\n        if (classroom != null && classroom.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查学时（如果关键词是数字）\n        try {\n            int keywordNumber = Integer.parseInt(keyword);\n            if (creditHours == keywordNumber) {\n                return true;\n            }\n        } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n            // 关键词不是数字，忽略\n        }\n        \n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取用于显示的教学信息\n     * 覆盖父类方法，提供更详细的教学信息\n     * \n     * @return 格式化的教学显示信息\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String getDisplayInfo() {\n        return courseName + " - 教师: " + teacherName + \n               ", 学期: " + semester + \n               ", 教室: " + classroom + \n               ", 学时: " + creditHours + "小时";\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取详细的教学信息\n com.example.entitysearch;\n\nimport java.util.ArrayList;\nimport java.util.List;\n\n/**\n * 搜索服务类\n * 实现对系统中所有实体（班级、教学、地址、用户）的搜索功能\n * 包含搜索逻辑、结果处理和性能优化\n */\npublic class SearchService {\n    \n    private MockData mockData; // 模拟数据实例，用于获取测试数据\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数\n     * 初始化搜索服务\n     */\n    public SearchService() {\n        this.mockData = new MockData();\n        System.out.println("搜索服务已初始化，加载模拟数据...");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索所有类型实体\n     * 对系统中的所有实体类型执行搜索，返回匹配的实体列表\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配关键词的所有实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Entity> searchAllEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<Entity> allResults = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n        // 验证关键词有效性\n        if (keyword == null || keyword.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("警告：搜索关键词为空，返回空结果");\n            return allResults;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("开始搜索关键词: \\"" + keyword + "\\"");\n        \n        // 对每种实体类型执行搜索\n        System.out.println("搜索班级实体...");\n        List<ClassEntity> classResults = searchClassEntities(keyword);\n        allResults.addAll(classResults);\n        \n System.out.println("搜索地址实体...");\n        List<Address> addressResults = searchAddressEntities(keyword);\n        allResults.addAll(addressResults);\n        \n        System.out.println("搜索用户实体...");\n        List<User> userResults = searchUserEntities(keyword);\n        allResults.addAll(userResults);\n        \n        System.out.println("搜索完成，共找到 " + allResults.size() + " 个匹配的实体");\n        \n        return allResults;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索班级实体\n     * 在班级实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的班级实体列表\n     */\n    public List<ClassEntity> searchClassEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<ClassEntity> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<ClassEntity> allClasses = mockData.getAllClassEntities();\n        \n        for (ClassEntity classEntity : allClasses) {\n            if (classEntity.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(classEntity);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索教学实体\n     * 在教学实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的教学实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Teaching> searchTeachingEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<Teaching> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<Teaching> allTeachings = mockData.getAllTeachingEntities();\n        \n        for (Teaching teaching : allTeachings) {\n            if (teaching.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(teaching);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索地址实体\n     * 在地址实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的地址实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Address> searchAddressEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<Address> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<Address> allAddresses = mockData.getAllAddressEntities();\n        \n        for (Address address : allAddresses) {\n            if (address.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(address);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索用户实体\n     * 在用户实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的用户实体列表\n     */\n    public List<User> searchUserEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<User> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<User> allUsers = mockData.getAllUserEntities();\n        \n        for (User user : allUsers) {\n            if (user.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(user);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 按实体类型分组的搜索\n     * 返回按类型分组的搜索结果\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 包含按类型分组结果的SearchResult对象\n     */\n    public SearchResult searchEntitiesGrouped(String keyword) {\n        List<ClassEntity> classes = searchClassEntities(keyword);\n        List<Teaching> teachings = searchTeachingEntities(keyword);\n        List<Address> addresses = searchAddressEntities(keyword);\n        List<User> users = searchUserEntities(keyword);\n        \n        return new SearchResult(keyword, classes, teachings, addresses, users);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 高级搜索 - 包含搜索历史记录\n     * 执行搜索并记录搜索历史\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @param adminId 执行搜索的管理员ID\n     * @return 搜索结果和搜索历史ID\n     */\n    public AdvancedSearchResult advancedSearch(String keyword, String adminId) {\n        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();\n        \n        // 执行搜索\n        List<Entity> searchResults = searchAllEntities(keyword);\n        \n        long endTime = System.currentTimeMillis();\n        long searchDuration = endTime - startTime;\n        \n        // 生成搜索历史记录ID\n        String searchId = generateSearchId(keyword, adminId);\n        \n        System.out.println("高级搜索完成 - 搜索ID: " + searchId + \n                          ", 耗时: " + searchDuration + "ms");\n        \n        return new AdvancedSearchResult(searchId, keyword, searchResults, searchDuration);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 生成搜索ID\n     * 基于关键词、管理员ID和时间戳生成唯一搜索ID\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @param adminId 管理员ID\n     * @return 生成的搜索ID\n     */\n    private String generateSearchId(String keyword, String adminId) {\n        String timestamp = String.valueOf(System.currentTimeMillis());\n        String keywordHash = String.valueOf(Math.abs(keyword.hashCode() % 10000));\n        \n        return "SRCH-" + adminId + "-" + keywordHash + "-" + timestamp.substring(timestamp.length() - 6);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 验证搜索权限\n     * 检查管理员是否有权限执行搜索\n     * \n     * @param adminId 管理员ID\n     * @return 如果有权限返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean validateSearchPermission(String adminId) {\n        // 模拟权限检查逻辑\n        if (adminId == null || adminId.isEmpty()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 在实际系统中，这里会调用权限服务进行检查\n        return adminId.startsWith("ADMIN-");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 清理搜索缓存\n     * 该方法可以用于清理搜索缓存或重置搜索状态\n     */\n    public void clearSearchCache() {\n        System.out.println("搜索缓存已清理");\n        // 在实际系统中，这里会清理缓存或重置状态\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 内部类：搜索结果包装类\n     * 用于返回按类型分组的搜索结果\n     */\n    public static class SearchResult {\n        private final String keyword;\n        private final List<ClassEntity> classes;\n        private final List<Teaching> teachings;\n        private final List<Address> addresses;\n        private final List<User> users;\n        \n        public SearchResult(String keyword, List<ClassEntity> classes, \n                          List<Teaching> teachings, List<Address> addresses, \n                          List<User> users) {\n            this.keyword = keyword;\n            this.classes = classes != null ? classes : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.teachings = teachings != null ? teachings : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.addresses = addresses != null ? addresses : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.users = users != null ? users : new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        \n        public String getKeyword() { return keyword; }\n        public List<ClassEntity> getClasses() { return classes; }\n        public List<Teaching> getTeachings() { return teachings; }\n        public List<Address> getAddresses() { return addresses; }\n        public List<User> getUsers() { return users; }\n        \n        public int getTotalCount() {\n            return classes.size() + teachings.size() + addresses.size() + users.size();\n        }\n        \n        @Override\n        public String toString() {\n            return "搜索关键词: \\"" + keyword + "\\", " +\n                   "班级: " + classes.size() + ", " +\n                   "教学: " + teachings.size() + ", " +\n                   "地址: " + addresses.size() + ", " +\n                   "用户: " + users.size() + ", " +\n                   "总计: " + getTotalCount();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 内部类：高级搜索结果\n     * 包含搜索元数据，如搜索ID和搜索时长\n     */\n    public static class AdvancedSearchResult {\n        private final String searchId;\n        private final String keyword;\n        private final List<Entity> results;\n        private final long searchDuration;\n        \n        public AdvancedSearchResult(String searchId, String keyword, \n                                   List<Entity> results, long searchDuration) {\n            this.searchId = searchId;\n            this.keyword = keyword;\n            this.results = results != null ? results : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.searchDuration = searchDuration;\n        }\n        \n        public String getSearchId() { return searchId; }\n        public String getKeyword() { return keyword; }\n        public List<Entity> getResults() { return results; }\n        public long getSearchDuration() { return searchDuration; }\n        \n        @Override\n        public String toString() {\n            return "搜索ID: " + searchId + \n                   ", 关键词: \\"" + keyword + "\\", " +\n                   "结果数: " + results.size() + ", " +\n                   "搜索耗时: " + searchDuration + "ms";\n        }\n    }\n}'}, {'role': 'assistant', 'content': 在实际系统中，这里会调用身份验证服务\n     * \n     * @return 验证成功返回true，失败返回false\n     */\n    private static boolean authenticateAdmin() {\n        System.out.println("正在进行管理员身份验证...");\n        \n        // 模拟验证过程\n        try {\n            Thread.sleep(800); // 模拟网络延迟\n        } catch (InterruptedException e) {\n            System.out.println("认证过程中出现异常: " + e.getMessage());\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 简化的模拟验证 - 实际系统中这里会有复杂的验证逻辑\n        // 假设验证总是成功（因为我们模拟的是已登录状态）\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 显示搜索结果\n     * 根据实体类型分类显示\n     * \n     * @param results 搜索结果列表\n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     */\n    private static void displaySearchResults(List<Entity> results, String keyword) {\n        if (results == null || results.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("未找到与关键词 \\"" + keyword + "\\" 相关的实体。");\n            return;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("找到 " + results.size() + " 个与 \\"" + keyword + "\\" 相关的实体：");\n        System.out.println("-".repeat(50));\n        \n        // 按实体类型分组计数\n        int classCount = 0;\n        int teachingCount = 0;\n        int addressCount = 0;\n        int     * 实现父类的抽象方法\n     * \n     * @return 实体类型字符串 "地址"\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String getType() {\n        return "地址";\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查地址实体是否包含指定的关键词\n     * 覆盖父类方法，添加地址特有字段的搜索\n     * \n     * @param keyword 要搜索的关键词\n     * @return 如果地址包含关键词返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    @Override\n    public boolean containsKeyword(String keyword) {\n        if (keyword == null || keyword.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        String lowerKeyword = keyword.toLowerCase().trim();\n        \n        // 首先调用父类的搜索逻辑\n        if (super.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查街道地址是否包含关键词\n        if (street != null && street.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查城市是否包含关键词\n        if (city != null && city.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查州/省份是否包含关键词\n        if (state != null && state.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查邮政编码是否包含关键词\n        if (postalCode != null && postalCode.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查国家是否包含关键词\n        if (country != null && country.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查建筑物名称是否包含关键词\n        if (buildingName != null && buildingName.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取用于显示的地址信息\n     * 覆盖父类方法，提供更详细的地址信息\n     * \n     * @return 格式化的地址显示信息\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String getDisplayInfo() {\n        StringBuilder display = new StringBuilder();\n        display.append(name);\n        \n        if (buildingName != null && !buildingName.isEmpty()) {\n            display.append(" (").append(buildingName).append(")");\n        }\n        \n        display.append(" - ");\n        \n        // 构建地址字符串\n        if (street != null && !street.isEmpty()) {\n            display.append(street).append(", ");\n        }\n        \n        if (city != null && !city.isEmpty()) {\n            display.append(city).append(", ");\n        }\n        \n        if (state != null && !state.isEmpty()) {\n            display.append(state).append(", ");\n        }\n        \n        if (postalCode != null && !postalCode.isEmpty()) {\n            display.append(postalCode).append(", ");\n        }\n        \n        if (country != null && !country.isEmpty()) {\n            display.append(country);\n        }\n        \n        // 移除末尾多余的逗号和空格\n        String result = display.toString().trim();\n        if (result.endsWith(",")) {\n            result = result.substring(0, result.length() - 1);\n        }\n        \n        return result;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取详细的地址信息\n     * 覆盖父类方法，提供完整的地址信息\n     * \n     * @return 详细的地址信息字符串\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String getDetailedInfo() {\n        return {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        String lowerKeyword = keyword.toLowerCase().trim();\n        \n        // 首先调用父类的搜索逻辑\n        if (super.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查用户名是否包含关键词\n        if (username != null && username.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查邮箱地址是否包含关键词\n        if (email != null && email.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查用户角色是否包含关键词\n        if (role != null && role.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查电话号码是否包含关键词\n        if (phoneNumber != null && department.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查激活状态（关键词为"激活"或"未激活"）\n        if ("激活".equalsIgnoreCase(keyword) && isActive) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        if ("未激活".equalsIgnoreCase(keyword) && !isActive) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        if ("active".equalsIgnoreCase(keyword) && isActive) {\n private MockData mockData; // 模拟数据实例，用于获取测试数据\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数\n     * 初始化搜索服务\n     */\n    public SearchService() {\n        this.mockData = new MockData();\n public List<Entity> searchAllEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<Entity> allResults = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n        // 验证关键词有效性\n        if (keyword == null || keyword.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("警告：搜索关键词为空，返回空结果");\n            return allResults;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("开始搜索关键词: \\"" + keyword + "\\"");\n        \n        // 对每种实体类型执行搜索\n        System.out.println("搜索班级实体...");\n        List<ClassEntity> classResults = searchClassEntities(keyword);\n        allResults.addAll(classResults);\n        \n  */\n    public List<ClassEntity> searchClassEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<ClassEntity> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<ClassEntity> allClasses = mockData.getAllClassEntities();\n        \n        for (ClassEntity classEntity : allClasses) {\n            if (classEntity.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(classEntity);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索教学实体\n     * 在教学实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的教学实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Teaching> searchTeachingEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<Teaching> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<Teaching> allTeachings = mockData.getAllTeachingEntities();\n        \n        for (Teaching teaching : allTeachings) {\n            if (teaching.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(teaching);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索地址实体\n     * 在地址实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的地址实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Address> searchAddressEntities(String      if (address.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(address);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索用户实体\n     * */\n    public SearchResult searchEntitiesGrouped(String keyword) {\n        List<ClassEntity> classes = searchClassEntities(keyword);\n        List<Teaching> teachings =     * @return 搜索结果和搜索历史ID\n     */\n    public AdvancedSearchResult advancedSearch(String keyword, String adminId) {\n        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();\n        \n        // 执行搜索\n        List<Entity> searchResults = searchAllEntities(keyword);\n        \n        long endTime = System.currentTimeMillis();\n        long searchDuration = endTime - startTime;\n        \n        // 生成搜索历史记录ID\n        String searchId = generateSearchId(keyword, adminId);\n        \n        System.out.println("高级搜索完成 - 搜索ID: " + searchId + \n                          ", 耗时: " + searchDuration + "ms");\n        \n        return new AdvancedSearchResult(searchId, keyword, searchResults, searchDuration);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 生成搜索ID\n     * 基于关键词、管理员ID和时间戳生成唯一搜索ID\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @param adminId 管理员ID\n     * @return 生成的搜索ID\n     */\n    private String generateSearchId(String keyword, String adminId) {\n        String timestamp = String.valueOf(System.currentTimeMillis());\n        String keywordHash = String.valueOf(Math.abs(keyword.hashCode() % 10000));\n        \n        return "SRCH-" + adminId + "-" + keywordHash + "-" + timestamp.substring(timestamp.length() - 6);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 验证搜索权限\n     * 检查管理员是否有权限执行搜索\n     * \n     * @param adminId 管理员ID\n     * @return 如果有权限返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean validateSearchPermission(String adminId) {\n        // 模拟权限检查逻辑\n        if (adminId == null || adminId.isEmpty()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 在实际系统中，这里会调用权限服务进行检查\n        return adminId.startsWith("ADMIN-");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 清理搜索缓存\n     * 该方法可以用于清理搜索缓存或重置搜索状态\n     */\n    public void clearSearchCache() {\n        System.out.println("搜索缓存已清理");\n        // 在实际系统中，这里会清理缓存或重置状态\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 内部类：搜索结果包装类\n     * 用于返回按类型分组的搜索结果\n     */\n    public static class SearchResult {\n        private final users;\n        \n        public SearchResult(String keyword, List<ClassEntity> classes, \n                          List<Teaching> teachings, List<Address> addresses, \n                          List<User> users) {\n            this.keyword = keyword;\n            this.classes = classes != null ? classes : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.teachings = teachings != null ? teachings : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.addresses = addresses != null ? addresses : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.users = users != null ? users : new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        \n        public String getKeyword() { return keyword; }\n        public List<ClassEntity> getClasses() { return classes; }\n        public List<Teaching> getTeachings() { return teachings; }\n        public List<Address> getAddresses() { return addresses; }\n        public List<User> getUsers() { return users; }\n        \n        public int getTotalCount() {\n            return classes.size() + teachings.size() + addresses.size() + users.size();\n        }\n        \n        @Override\n        public String toString() {\n            return "搜索关键词: \\"" + keyword + "\\", " +\n                   "班级: " + classes.size() + ", " +\n                   "教学: " + teachings.size() + ", " +\n                   "地址: " + addresses.size() + ", " +\n                   "用户: " + users.size() + ", " +\n                   "总计: " + getTotalCount();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 内部类：高级搜索结果\n     * 包含搜索元数据，如搜索ID和搜索时长\n     */\n    public static class AdvancedSearchResult {\n        private final String searchId;\n        private final String keyword;\n        private final List<Entity> results;\n        private final long searchDuration;\n        \n        public AdvancedSearchResult(String searchId, String keyword, \n                                   List<Entity> results, long searchDuration) {\n            this.searchId = searchId;\n            this.keyword = keyword;\n public String getKeyword() { return keyword; }\n        public List<Entity> getResults() { return results; }\n        public long getSearchDuration() { return searchDuration; }\n        \n     /**
     * 获取所有实体（混合类型）
     * 返回所有类型实体的混合列表
     * 
     * @return 所有实体的混合列表
     */
    public List<Entity> getAllEntities() {
        List<Entity> allEntities = new ArrayList<>();
        
        allEntities.addAll(getAllClassEntities());
        allEntities.addAll(getAllTeachingEntities());
        allEntities.addAll(getAllAddressEntities());
        allEntities.addAll(getAllUserEntities());
        
        return allEntities;
    }
    
    /**
     * 获取实体统计信息
     * 返回系统中各类实体的数量统计
     * 
     * @return 包含各类实体数量的字符串
     */
    public String getEntityStatistics() {
        int classCount = getAllClassEntities().size();
        int teachingCount = getAllTeachingEntities().size();
        int addressCount = getAllAddressEntities().size();
        int userCount = getAllUserEntities().size();
        int totalCount = classCount + teachingCount + addressCount + userCount;
        
        return String.format(
            "系统实体统计：班级=%d, 教学=%d, 地址=%d, 用户=%d, 总计=%d",
            classCount, teachingCount, addressCount, userCount, totalCount
        );
    }
    
    /**
     * 初始化模拟数据
     * 打印模拟数据加载信息
     */
    public void initializeMockData() {
        System.out.println("模拟数据初始化完成！");
        System.out.println(getEntityStatistics());
        System.out.println("模拟数据已准备就绪，可用于搜索测试。");
    }
    
    /**
     * 根据ID查找特定实体
     * 在所有实体中查找指定ID的实体
     * 
     * @param entityId 实体ID
     * @return 找到的实体，如果未找到则返回null
     */
    public Entity findEntityById(String entityId) {
        if (entityId == null || entityId.isEmpty()) {
            return null;
        }
        
        // 在所有实体中搜索
        for (Entity entity : getAllEntities()) {
            if (entityId.equals(entity.getId())) {
                return entity;
            }
        }
        
        return null;
    }
    
    /**
     * 根据名称查找实体
     * 在所有实体中查找包含指定名称的实体
     * 
     * @param name 实体名称（或部分名称）
     * @return 匹配的实体列表
     */
    public List<Entity> findEntitiesByName(String name) {
        List<Entity> results = new ArrayList<>();
        
        if (name == null || name.isEmpty()) {
            return results;
        }
        
        String lowerName = name.toLowerCase();
        
        for (Entity entity : getAllEntities()) {
            if (entity.getName() != null && entity.getName().toLowerCase().contains(lowerName)) {
                results.add(entity);
            }
        }
        
        return results;
    }
}

private String role;             // 用户角色（管理员、教师、学生等）\n    private String phoneNumber;      // 电话号码\n    private boolean isActive;        // 用户是否激活\n    private String department;       // 所属部门\n    \n * \n     * @return 实体类型字符串 "用户"\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String getType() {\n        return "用户";\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查用户实体是否包含指定的关键词\n     * 覆盖父类方法，添加用户特有字段的搜索\n     * \n     * @param keyword 要搜索的关键词\n     * @return 如果用户包含关键词返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    @Override\n    public boolean containsKeyword(String keyword) {\n        if (keyword == null || keyword.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        String lowerKeyword = keyword.toLowerCase().trim();\n        \n        // 首先调用父类的搜索逻辑\n        if (super.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查用户名是否包含关键词\n        if (username != null && username.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查邮箱地址是否包含关键词\n        if (email != null && email.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查用户角色是否包含关键词\n        if (role != null && role.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查电话号码是否包含关键词\n        if (phoneNumber != null && phoneNumber.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查部门是否包含关键词\n        if (department != null && department.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查激活状态（关键词为"激活"或"未激活"）\n        if ("激活".equalsIgnoreCase(keyword) && isActive) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        if ("未激活".equalsIgnoreCase(keyword) && !isActive) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        if ("active".equalsIgnoreCase(keyword) && isActive) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        if ("inactive".equalsIgnoreCase(keyword) && !isActive) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * "激活" : "未激活";\n        return name + " (" + username + ") - 角色: " + role + \n               ", 邮箱: " + email + ", 状态: " + status + \n               (department != null && !department.isEmpty() ? ", 部门: " + department : "");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取详细的用户信息\n     * 覆盖父类方法，提供完整的用户信息\n     * \n     * @return 详细的用户信息字符串\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String getDetailedInfo() {\n        return getType() + " ID: " + id + \n               ", 姓名: " + name + \n               ", 描述: " + description + \n               ", 用户名: " + username + \n               ", 邮箱: " + email + \n               ", 角色: " + role + \n               ", 电话: " + phoneNumber + \n               ", 状态: " + (isActive ? com.example.entitysearch;\n\nimport java.util.ArrayList;\nimport java.util.List;\n\n/**\n * 搜索服务类\n * 实现对系统中所有实体（班级、教学、地址、用户）的搜索功能\n * 包含搜索逻辑、结果处理和性能优化\n */\npublic class SearchService {\n    \n    private MockData mockData; // 模拟数据实例，用于获取测试数据\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数\n     * 初始化搜索服务\n     */\n    public SearchService() {\n        this.mockData = new MockData();\n        System.out.println("搜索服务已初始化，加载模拟数据...");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索所有类型实体\n     * 对系统中的所有实体类型执行搜索，返回匹配的实体列表\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配关键词的所有实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Entity> searchAllEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<Entity> allResults = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n        // 验证关键词有效性\n        if (keyword == null || keyword.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("警告：搜索关键词为空，返回空结果");\n            return allResults;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("开始搜索关键词: \\"" + keyword + "\\"");\n        \n        // 对每种实体类型执行搜索\n        System.out.println("搜索班级实体...");\n        List<ClassEntity> classResults = searchClassEntities(keyword);\n        allResults.addAll(classResults);\n        \n        System.out.println("搜索教学实体...");\n        List<Teaching> teachingResults = searchTeachingEntities(keyword);\n        allResults.addAll(teachingResults);\n        \n        System.out.println("搜索地址实体...");\n        List<Address> addressResults = searchAddressEntities(keyword);\n        allResults.addAll(addressResults);\n        \n        System.out.println("搜索用户实体...");\n        List<User> userResults = searchUserEntities(keyword);\n        allResults.addAll(userResults);\n        \n        System.out.println("搜索完成，共找到 " + allResults.size() + " 个匹配的实体");\n        \n        return allResults;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索班级实体\n     * 在班级实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的班级实体列表\n     */\n    public List<ClassEntity> searchClassEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<ClassEntity> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<ClassEntity> allClasses = mockData.getAllClassEntities();\n        \n        for (ClassEntity classEntity : allClasses) {\n            if (classEntity.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(classEntity);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索教学实体\n     * 在教学实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的教学实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Teaching> searchTeachingEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<Teaching> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<Teaching> allTeachings = mockData.getAllTeachingEntities();\n        \n        for (Teaching teaching : allTeachings) {\n            if (teaching.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(teaching);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索地址实体\n     * 在地址实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的地址实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Address> searchAddressEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<Address> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<Address> allAddresses = mockData.getAllAddressEntities();\n        \n        for (Address address : allAddresses) {\n            if (address.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(address);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索用户实体\n     * 在用户实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的用户实体列表\n     */\n    public List<User> searchUserEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<User> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<User> allUsers = mockData.getAllUserEntities();\n        \n        for (User user : allUsers) {\n            if (user.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(user);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 按实体类型分组的搜索\n     * 返回按类型分组的搜索结果\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 包含按类型分组结果的SearchResult对象\n     */\n    public SearchResult searchEntitiesGrouped(String keyword) {\n        List<ClassEntity> classes = searchClassEntities(keyword);\n        List<Teaching> teachings = searchTeachingEntities(keyword);\n        List<Address> addresses = searchAddressEntities(keyword);\n        List<User> users = searchUserEntities(keyword);\n        \n        return new SearchResult(keyword, classes, teachings, addresses, users);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 高级搜索 - 包含搜索历史记录\n     * 执行搜索并记录搜索历史\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @param adminId 执行搜索的管理员ID\n     * @return 搜索结果和搜索历史ID\n     */\n    public AdvancedSearchResult advancedSearch(String keyword, String adminId) {\n        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();\n        \n        // 执行搜索\n        List<Entity> searchResults = searchAllEntities(keyword);\n        \n        long endTime = System.currentTimeMillis();\n        long searchDuration = endTime - startTime;\n        \n        // 生成搜索历史记录ID\n        String searchId = generateSearchId(keyword, adminId);\n        \n        System.out.println("高级搜索完成 - 搜索ID: " + searchId + \n                          ", 耗时: " + searchDuration + "ms");\n        \n        return new AdvancedSearchResult(searchId, keyword, searchResults, searchDuration);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 生成搜索ID\n     * 基于关键词、管理员ID和时间戳生成唯一搜索ID\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @param adminId 管理员ID\n     * @return 生成的搜索ID\n     */\n    private String generateSearchId(String keyword, String adminId) {\n        String timestamp = String.valueOf(System.currentTimeMillis());\n        String keywordHash = String.valueOf(Math.abs(keyword.hashCode() % 10000));\n        \n        return "SRCH-" + adminId + "-" + keywordHash + "-" + timestamp.substring(timestamp.length() - 6);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 验证搜索权限\n     * 检查管理员是否有权限执行搜索\n     * \n     * @param adminId 管理员ID\n     * @return 如果有权限返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean validateSearchPermission(String adminId) {\n        // 模拟权限检查逻辑\n        if (adminId == null || adminId.isEmpty()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 在实际系统中，这里会调用权限服务进行检查\n        return adminId.startsWith("ADMIN-");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 清理搜索缓存\n     * 该方法可以用于清理搜索缓存或重置搜索状态\n     */\n    public void clearSearchCache() {\n        System.out.println("搜索缓存已清理");\n        // 在实际系统中，这里会清理缓存或重置状态\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 内部类：搜索结果包装类\n     * 用于返回按类型分组的搜索结果\n     */\n    public static class SearchResult {\n        private final String keyword;\n        private final List<ClassEntity> classes;\n        private final List<Teaching> teachings;\n        private final List<Address> addresses;\n        private final List<User> users;\n        \n        public SearchResult(String keyword, List<ClassEntity> classes, \n                          List<Teaching> teachings, List<Address> addresses, \n                          List<User> users) {\n            this.keyword = keyword;\n            this.classes = classes != null ? classes : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.teachings = teachings != null ? teachings : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.addresses = addresses != null ? addresses : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.users = users != null ? users : new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        \n        public String getKeyword() { return keyword; }\n        public List<ClassEntity> getClasses() { return classes; }\n        public List<Teaching> getTeachings() { return teachings; }\n        public List<Address> getAddresses() { return addresses; }\n        public List<User> getUsers() { return users; }\n        \n        public int getTotalCount() {\n            return classes.size() + teachings.size() + addresses.size() + users.size();\n        }\n        \n        @Override\n        public String toString() {\n            return "搜索关键词: \\"" + keyword + "\\", " +\n                   "班级: " + classes.size() + ", " +\n                   "教学: " + teachings.size() + ", " +\n                   "地址: " + addresses.size() + ", " +\n                   "用户: " + users.size() + ", " +\n                   "总计: " + getTotalCount();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 内部类：高级搜索结果\n     * 包含搜索元数据，如搜索ID和搜索时长\n     */\n    public static class AdvancedSearchResult {\n        private final String searchId;\n        private final String keyword;\n        private final List<Entity> results;\n        private final long searchDuration;\n        \n        public AdvancedSearchResult(String searchId, String keyword, \n                                   List<Entity> results, long searchDuration) {\n            this.searchId = searchId;\n            this.keyword = keyword;\n            this.results = results != null ? results : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.searchDuration = searchDuration;\n        }\n        \n        public String getSearchId() { return searchId; }\n        public String getKeyword() { return keyword; }\n        public List<Entity> getResults() { return results; }\n        public long getSearchDuration() { return searchDuration; }\n        \n        @Override\n        public String toString() {\n            return "搜索ID: " + searchId + \n                   ", 关键词: \\"" + keyword + "\\", " +\n                   "结果数: " + results.size() + ", " +\n                   "搜索耗时: " + searchDuration + "ms";\n        }\n    }\n}'}, {'role': 'assistant', 'content': name.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查描述中是否包含关键词\n        if (description != null &&    return "教学";\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查教学实体是否包含指定的关键词\n     * 覆盖父类方法，添加教学特有字段的搜索\n     * \n     * @param keyword 要搜索的关键词\n     * @return 如果教学包含关键词返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    @Override\n    public boolean containsKeyword(String keyword) {\n        if (keyword == null || keyword.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        String lowerKeyword = keyword.toLowerCase().trim();\n        \n        // 首先调用父类的搜索逻辑\n        if (super.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查课程名称是否包含关键词\n        if (courseName != null && courseName.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查教师ID是否包含关键词\n        if (teacherId != null && teacherId.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查教师姓名是否包含关键词\n        if (teacherName != null && teacherName.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查学期是否包含关键词\n        if (semester != null && semester.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查教室是否包含关键词\n        if (classroom != null && classroom.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查学时（如果关键词是数字）\n        try {\n            int keywordNumber = Integer.parseInt(keyword);\n            if (creditHours == keywordNumber) {\n                return true;\n            }\n        } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n            // 关键词不是数字，忽略\n        }\n        \n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取用于显示的教学信息\n     * 覆盖父类方法，提供更详细的教学信息\n     * \n     * @return 格式化的教学显示信息\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String getDisplayInfo() {\n        return courseName + " - 教师: " + teacherName + \n               ", 学期: " + semester + \n               ", 教室: " + classroom + \n               ", 学时: " + creditHours + "小时";\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取详细的教学信息\n private MockData mockData; // 模拟数据实例，用于获取测试数据\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数\n     * 初始化搜索服务\n     */\n    public SearchService() {\n        this.mockData = new MockData();\n        System.out.println("搜索服务已初始化，加载模拟数据...");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索所有类型实体\n     * 对系统中的所有实体类型执行搜索，返回匹配的实体列表\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配关键词的所有实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Entity> searchAllEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<Entity> allResults = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n        // 验证关键词有效性\n        if (keyword == null || keyword.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("警告：搜索关键词为空，返回空结果");\n            return allResults;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("开始搜索关键词: \\"" + keyword + "\\"");\n        \n        //
