System.out.println("搜索用户实体...");\n        List<User> userResults = searchUserEntities(keyword);\n        allResults.addAll(userResults);\n        \n        System.out.println("搜索完成，共找到 " + allResults.size() + " 个匹配的实体");\n        \n        return allResults;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索班级实体\n     * 在班级实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的班级实体列表\n     */\n    public List<ClassEntity> searchClassEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<ClassEntity> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<ClassEntity> allClasses = mockData.getAllClassEntities();\n        \n        for (ClassEntity classEntity : allClasses) {\n            if (classEntity.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(classEntity);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索教学实体\n     * 在教学实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的教学实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Teaching> searchTeachingEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<Teaching> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<Teaching> allTeachings = mockData.getAllTeachingEntities();\n        \n        for (Teaching teaching : allTeachings) {\n            if (teaching.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(teaching);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索地址实体\n     * 在地址实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的地址实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Address> searchAddressEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<Address> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<Address> allAddresses = mockData.getAllAddressEntities();\n        \n        for (Address address : allAddresses) {\n            if (address.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(address);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索用户实体\n     * 在用户实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的用户实体列表\n     */\n    public List<User> searchUserEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<User> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<User> allUsers = mockData.getAllUserEntities();\n        \n        for (User user : allUsers) {\n            if (user.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(user);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 按实体类型分组的搜索\n     * 返回按类型分组的搜索结果\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 包含按类型分组结果的SearchResult对象\n     */\n    public SearchResult searchEntitiesGrouped(String keyword) {\n        List<ClassEntity> classes = searchClassEntities(keyword);\n        List<Teaching> teachings = searchTeachingEntities(keyword);\n        List<Address> addresses = searchAddressEntities(keyword);\n        List<User> users = searchUserEntities(keyword);\n        \n        return new SearchResult(keyword, classes, teachings, addresses, users);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 高级搜索 - 包含搜索历史记录\n     * 执行搜索并记录搜索历史\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @param adminId 执行搜索的管理员ID\n     * @return 搜索结果和搜索历史ID\n     */\n    public AdvancedSearchResult advancedSearch(String keyword, String adminId) {\n        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();\n        \n        // 执行搜索\n        List<Entity> searchResults = searchAllEntities(keyword);\n        \n        long endTime = System.currentTimeMillis();\n        long searchDuration = endTime - startTime;\n        \n        // 生成搜索历史记录ID\n        String searchId = generateSearchId(keyword, adminId);\n        \n        System.out.println("高级搜索完成 - 搜索ID: " + searchId + \n                          ", 耗时: " + searchDuration + "ms");\n        \n        return new AdvancedSearchResult(searchId, keyword, searchResults, searchDuration);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 生成搜索ID\n     * 基于关键词、管理员ID和时间戳生成唯一搜索ID\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @param adminId 管理员ID\n     * @return 生成的搜索ID\n     */\n    private String generateSearchId(String keyword, String adminId) {\n        String timestamp = String.valueOf(System.currentTimeMillis());\n        String keywordHash = String.valueOf(Math.abs(keyword.hashCode() % 10000));\n        \n        return "SRCH-" + adminId + "-" + keywordHash + "-" + timestamp.substring(timestamp.length() - 6);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 验证搜索权限\n     * 检查管理员是否有权限执行搜索\n     * \n     * @param adminId 管理员ID\n     * @return 如果有权限返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean validateSearchPermission(String adminId) {\n        // 模拟权限检查逻辑\n        if (adminId == null || adminId.isEmpty()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 在实际系统中，这里会调用权限服务进行检查\n        return adminId.startsWith("ADMIN-");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 清理搜索缓存\n     * 该方法可以用于清理搜索缓存或重置搜索状态\n     */\n    public void clearSearchCache() {\n        System.out.println("搜索缓存已清理");\n        // 在实际系统中，这里会清理缓存或重置状态\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 内部类：搜索结果包装类\n     * 用于返回按类型分组的搜索结果\n     */\n    public static class SearchResult {\n        private final String keyword;\n        private final List<ClassEntity> classes;\n        private final List<Teaching> teachings;\n        private final List<Address> addresses;\n        private final List<User> users;\n        \n        public SearchResult(String keyword, List<ClassEntity> classes, \n                          List<Teaching> teachings, List<Address> addresses, \n                          List<User> users) {\n            this.keyword = keyword;\n            this.classes = classes != null ? classes : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.teachings = teachings != null ? teachings : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.addresses = addresses != null ? addresses : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.users = users != null ? users : new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        \n        public String getKeyword() { return keyword; }\n        public List<ClassEntity> getClasses() { return classes; }\n        public List<Teaching> getTeachings() { return teachings; }\n        public List<Address> getAddresses() { return addresses; }\n        public List<User> getUsers() { return users; }\n        \n        public int getTotalCount() {\n            return classes.size() + teachings.size() + addresses.size() + users.size();\n        }\n        \n        @Override\n        public String toString() {\n            return "搜索关键词: \\"" + keyword + "\\", " +\n                   "班级: " + classes.size() + ", " +\n                   "教学: " + teachings.size() + ", " +\n                   "地址: " + addresses.size() + ", " +\n                   "用户: " + users.size() + ", " +\n                   "总计: " + getTotalCount();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 内部类：高级搜索结果\n     * 包含搜索元数据，如搜索ID和搜索时长\n     */\n    public static class AdvancedSearchResult {\n        private final String searchId;\n        private final String keyword;\n        private final List<Entity> results;\n        private final long searchDuration;\n        \n        public AdvancedSearchResult(String searchId, String keyword, \n                                   List<Entity> results, long searchDuration) {\n            this.searchId = searchId;\n            this.keyword = keyword;\n            this.results = results != null ? results : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.searchDuration = searchDuration;\n        }\n        \n        public String getSearchId() { return searchId; }\n        public String getKeyword() { return keyword; }\n        public List<Entity> getResults() { return results; }\n        public long getSearchDuration() { return searchDuration; }\n        \n        @Override\n        public String toString() {\n            return "搜索ID: " + searchId + \n                   ", 关键词: \\"" + keyword + "\\", " +\n                   "结果数: " + results.size() + ", " +\n                   "搜索耗时: " + searchDuration + "ms";\n        }\n    }\n}'}, {'role': 'assistant', 'content':      int teachingCount = getAllTeachingEntities().size();\n        int addressCount = getAllAddressEntities().size();\n        int userCount = getAllUserEntities().size();\n        int totalCount = classCount + teachingCount + addressCount + userCount;\n        \n        return String.format(\n            "系统实体统计：班级=%d, 教学=%d, 地址=%d, 用户=%d, 总计=%d",\n            classCount, teachingCount, addressCount, userCount, totalCount\n        );\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 初始化模拟数据\n     * 打印模拟数据加载信息\n     */\n    public void initializeMockData() {\n        System.out.println("模拟数据初始化完成！");\n        System.out.println(getEntityStatistics());\n        System.out.println("模拟数据已准备就绪，可用于搜索测试。");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 根据ID查找特定实体\n     * 在所有实体中查找指定ID的实体\n     * \n     * @param entityId 实体ID\n     * @return 找到的实体，如果未找到则返回null\n     */\n    public Entity findEntityById(String entityId) {\n        if (entityId == null || entityId.isEmpty()) {\n            return null;\n        }\n        \n        // 在所有实体中搜索\n        for (Entity entity : getAllEntities()) {\n            if (entityId.equals(entity.getId())) {\n                return entity;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return null;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 根据名称查找实体\n     * 在所有实体中查找包含指定名称的实体\n     * \n     * @param name 实体名称（或部分名称）\n     * @return 匹配的实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Entity> findEntitiesByName(String name) {\n        List<Entity> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n        if (name == null || name.isEmpty()) {\n            return results;\n        }\n        \n        String lowerName = name.toLowerCase();\n        \n        for (Entity entity : getAllEntities()) {\n            if (entity.getName() != null && entity.getName().toLowerCase().contains(lowerName)) {\n                results.add(entity);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n}'}, {'role': 'assistant', 'content': 001|package com.example.entitysearch;
002|
003|import java.util.List;
004|import java.util.Scanner;
005|
006|/**
007| * 主程序入口类 - 管理员实体搜索系统
008| * 模拟管理员登录后搜索系统中所有实体的功能
009| * 包含班级（ClassEntity）、教学（Teaching）、地址（Address）和用户（User）
010| */
011|public class AdminEntitySearch {
012|    
013|    /**
014|     * 主方法 - 程序入口点
015|     * 模拟管理员登录和搜索流程
016|     */
017|    public static void main(String[] args) {
018|        System.out.println("=== 管理员实体搜索系统 ===\n");
019|        
020|        // 模拟管理员登录验证
021|        if (!authenticateAdmin()) {
022|            System.out.println("管理员身份验证失败！程序退出。");
023|            return;
024|        }
025|        
026|        System.out.println("管理员登录成功！\n");
027|        
028|        // 创建搜索服务
029|        SearchService searchService = new SearchService();
030|        
031|        // 获取控制台输入
032|        Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);
033|        
034|        boolean continueSearching = true;
035|        
036|        while (continueSearching) {
037|            System.out.println("请输入搜索关键词（输入 'exit' 退出程序）:");
038|            String keyword = scanner.nextLine().trim();
039|            
040|            // 检查用户是否要退出
041|            if ("exit".equalsIgnoreCase(keyword)) {
042|                System.out.println("用户停止操作。");
043|                System.out.println("连接到中断的SMOS服务器...");
044|                continueSearching = false;
045|                break;
046|            }
047|            
048|            // 验证关键词是否为空
049|            if (keyword.isEmpty()) {
050|                System.out.println("错误：搜索关键词不能为空！\n");
051|                continue;
052|            }
053|            
054|            // 执行搜索
055|            System.out.println("\n正在搜索关键词: \"" + keyword + "\"...\n");
056|            List<Entity> searchResults = searchService.searchAllEntities(keyword);
057|            
058|            // 显示搜索结果
059|            displaySearchResults(searchResults, keyword);
060|            
061|            System.out.println("=".repeat(50) + "\n");
062|        }
063|        
064|        scanner.close();
065|        System.out.println("程序已退出。");
066|    }
067|    
068|    /**
069|     * 模拟管理员身份验证
070|     * 在实际系统中，这里会调用身份验证服务
071|     * 
072|     * @return 验证成功返回true，失败返回false
073|     */
074|    private static boolean authenticateAdmin() {
075|        System.out.println("正在进行管理员身份验证...");
076|        
077|        // 模拟验证过程
078|        try {
079|            Thread.sleep(800); // 模拟网络延迟
080|        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
081|            System.out.println("认证过程中出现异常: " + e.getMessage());
082|            return false;
083|        }
084|        
085|        // 简化的模拟验证 - 实际系统中这里会有复杂的验证逻辑
086|        // 假设验证总是成功（因为我们模拟的是已登录状态）
087|        return true;
088|    }
089|    
090|    /**
091|     * 显示搜索结果
092|     * 根据实体类型分类显示
093|     * 
094|     * @param results 搜索结果列表
095|     * @param keyword 搜索关键词
096|     */
097|    private static void displaySearchResults(List<Entity> results, String keyword) {
098|        if (results == null || results.isEmpty()) {
099|            System.out.println("未找到与关键词 \"" + keyword + "\" 相关的实体。");
100|            return;
101|        }
102|        
103|        System.out.println("找到 " + results.size() + " 个与 \"" + keyword + "\" 相关的实体：");
104|        System.out.println("-".repeat(50));
105|        
106|        // 按实体类型分组计数
107|        int classCount = 0;
108|        int teachingCount = 0;
109|        int addressCount = 0;
110|        int userCount = 0;
111|        
112|        // 显示搜索到的所有实体
113|        for (int i = 0; i < results.size(); i++) {
114|            Entity entity = results.get(i);
115|            System.out.printf("%d. [%s] %s%n", i + 1, entity.getType(), entity.getDisplayInfo());
116|            
117|            // 统计各类实体数量
118|            switch (entity.getType()) {
119|                case "班级":
120|                    classCount++;
121|                    break;
122|                case "教学":
123|                    teachingCount++;
124|                    break;
125|                case "地址":
126|                    addressCount++;
127|                    break;
128|                case "用户":
129|                    userCount++;
130|                    break;
131|            }
132|        }
133|        
134|        System.out.println("-".repeat(50));
135|        System.out.println("搜索结果统计：");
136|        System.out.println("  班级: " + classCount + " 个");
137|        System.out.println("  教学: " + teachingCount + " 个");
138|        System.out.println("  地址: " + addressCount + " 个");
139|        System.out.println("  用户: " + userCount + " 个");
140|        
141|        // 根据后置条件要求，显示"活动列表"信息
142|        System.out.println("\n【后置条件验证】:");
143|        System.out.println("✓ 用户正在显示与输入的关键词 \"" + keyword + "\" 对应的实体活动列表");
144|        System.out.println("✓ 列表包含 " + results.size() + " 个活动实体");
145|    }

", "signature": "(query: str, path: Union[str, pathlib.Path]) -> List[str]", "parameters": "Args: query (str): The search query string to look for in the indexed files. path (Union[str, Path]): A pathname or filename to search within. Example: >>> query = \\"The problem to be analyzed from the document\\" >>> file_or_path = \\"The pathname or filename you want to search within\\" >>> texts: List[str] = await Editor.similarity_search(query=query, path=file_or_path) >>> print(texts)"}, "write": {"type": "function", "description": "Write the whole content to a file. name.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查描述中是否包含关键词\n        if (description != null &&    return "教学";\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 检查教学实体是否包含指定的关键词\n     * 覆盖父类方法，添加教学特有字段的搜索\n     * \n     * @param keyword 要搜索的关键词\n     * @return 如果教学包含关键词返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    @Override\n    public boolean containsKeyword(String keyword) {\n        if (keyword == null || keyword.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        String lowerKeyword = keyword.toLowerCase().trim();\n        \n        // 首先调用父类的搜索逻辑\n        if (super.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查课程名称是否包含关键词\n        if (courseName != null && courseName.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查教师ID是否包含关键词\n        if (teacherId != null && teacherId.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查教师姓名是否包含关键词\n        if (teacherName != null && teacherName.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查学期是否包含关键词\n        if (semester != null && semester.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查教室是否包含关键词\n        if (classroom != null && classroom.toLowerCase().contains(lowerKeyword)) {\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        // 检查学时（如果关键词是数字）\n        try {\n            int keywordNumber = Integer.parseInt(keyword);\n            if (creditHours == keywordNumber) {\n                return true;\n            }\n        } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n            // 关键词不是数字，忽略\n        }\n        \n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取用于显示的教学信息\n     * 覆盖父类方法，提供更详细的教学信息\n     * \n     * @return 格式化的教学显示信息\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String getDisplayInfo() {\n        return courseName + " - 教师: " + teacherName + \n               ", 学期: " + semester + \n               ", 教室: " + classroom + \n               ", 学时: " + creditHours + "小时";\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 获取详细的教学信息\n private MockData mockData; // 模拟数据实例，用于获取测试数据\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数\n     * 初始化搜索服务\n     */\n    public SearchService() {\n        this.mockData = new MockData();\n        System.out.println("搜索服务已初始化，加载模拟数据...");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索所有类型实体\n     * 对系统中的所有实体类型执行搜索，返回匹配的实体列表\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配关键词的所有实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Entity> searchAllEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<Entity> allResults = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n        // 验证关键词有效性\n        if (keyword == null || keyword.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("警告：搜索关键词为空，返回空结果");\n            return allResults;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("开始搜索关键词: \\"" + keyword + "\\"");\n        \n        // System.out.println("搜索用户实体...");\n        List<User> userResults = searchUserEntities(keyword);\n        allResults.addAll(userResults);\n        \n        System.out.println("搜索完成，共找到 " + allResults.size() + " 个匹配的实体");\n        \n        return allResults;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索班级实体\n     * 在班级实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的班级实体列表\n     */\n    public List<ClassEntity> searchClassEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<ClassEntity> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<ClassEntity> allClasses = mockData.getAllClassEntities();\n        \n        for (ClassEntity classEntity : allClasses) {\n            if (classEntity.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(classEntity);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索教学实体\n     * 在教学实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的教学实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Teaching> searchTeachingEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<Teaching> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<Teaching> allTeachings = mockData.getAllTeachingEntities();\n        \n        for (Teaching teaching : allTeachings) {\n            if (teaching.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(teaching);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索地址实体\n     * 在地址实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的地址实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Address> searchAddressEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<Address> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<Address> allAddresses = mockData.getAllAddressEntities();\n        \n        for (Address address : allAddresses) {\n            if (address.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(address);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索用户实体\n     * 在用户实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的用户实体列表\n     */\n    public List<User> searchUserEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<User> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<User> allUsers = mockData.getAllUserEntities();\n        \n        for (User user : allUsers) {\n            if (user.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(user);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 按实体类型分组的搜索\n     * 返回按类型分组的搜索结果\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 包含按类型分组结果的SearchResult对象\n     */\n    public SearchResult searchEntitiesGrouped(String keyword) {\n        List<ClassEntity> classes = searchClassEntities(keyword);\n        List<Teaching> teachings = searchTeachingEntities(keyword);\n        List<Address> addresses = searchAddressEntities(keyword);\n        List<User> users = searchUserEntities(keyword);\n        \n        return new SearchResult(keyword, classes, teachings, addresses, users);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 高级搜索 - 包含搜索历史记录\n     * 执行搜索并记录搜索历史\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @param adminId 执行搜索的管理员ID\n     * @return 搜索结果和搜索历史ID\n     */\n    public AdvancedSearchResult advancedSearch(String keyword, String adminId) {\n        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();\n        \n        // 执行搜索\n        List<Entity> searchResults = searchAllEntities(keyword);\n        \n        long endTime = System.currentTimeMillis();\n        long searchDuration = endTime - startTime;\n        \n        // 生成搜索历史记录ID\n        String searchId = generateSearchId(keyword, adminId);\n        \n        System.out.println("高级搜索完成 - 搜索ID: " + searchId + \n                          ", 耗时: " + searchDuration + "ms");\n        \n        return new AdvancedSearchResult(searchId, keyword, searchResults, searchDuration);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 生成搜索ID\n     * 基于关键词、管理员ID和时间戳生成唯一搜索ID\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @param adminId 管理员ID\n     * @return 生成的搜索ID\n     */\n    private String generateSearchId(String keyword, String adminId) {\n        String timestamp = String.valueOf(System.currentTimeMillis());\n        String keywordHash = String.valueOf(Math.abs(keyword.hashCode() % 10000));\n        \n        return "SRCH-" + adminId + "-" + keywordHash + "-" + timestamp.substring(timestamp.length() - 6);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 验证搜索权限\n     * 检查管理员是否有权限执行搜索\n     * \n     * @param adminId 管理员ID\n     * @return 如果有权限返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean validateSearchPermission(String adminId) {\n        // 模拟权限检查逻辑\n        if (adminId == null || adminId.isEmpty()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 在实际系统中，这里会调用权限服务进行检查\n        return adminId.startsWith("ADMIN-");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 清理搜索缓存\n     * 该方法可以用于清理搜索缓存或重置搜索状态\n     */\n    public void clearSearchCache() {\n        System.out.println("搜索缓存已清理");\n        // 在实际系统中，这里会清理缓存或重置状态\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 内部类：搜索结果包装类\n     * 用于返回按类型分组的搜索结果\n     */\n    public static class SearchResult {\n        private final String keyword;\n        private final List<ClassEntity> classes;\n        private final List<Teaching> teachings;\n        private final List<Address> addresses;\n        private final List<User> users;\n        \n        public SearchResult(String keyword, List<ClassEntity> classes, \n                          List<Teaching> teachings, List<Address> addresses, \n                          List<User> users) {\n            this.keyword = keyword;\n            this.classes = classes != null ? classes : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.teachings = teachings != null ? teachings : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.addresses = addresses != null ? addresses : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.users = users != null ? users : new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        \n        public String getKeyword() { return keyword; }\n        public List<ClassEntity> getClasses() { return classes; }\n        public List<Teaching> getTeachings() { return teachings; }\n        public List<Address> getAddresses() { return addresses; }\n        public List<User> getUsers() { return users; }\n        \n        public int getTotalCount() {\n            return classes.size() + teachings.size() + addresses.size() + users.size();\n        }\n        \n        @Override\n        public String toString() {\n            return "搜索关键词: \\"" + keyword + "\\", " +\n                   "班级: " + classes.size() + ", " +\n                   "教学: " + teachings.size() + ", " +\n                   "地址: " + addresses.size() + ", " +\n                   "用户: " + users.size() + ", " +\n                   "总计: " + getTotalCount();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 内部类：高级搜索结果\n     * 包含搜索元数据，如搜索ID和搜索时长\n     */\n    public static class AdvancedSearchResult {\n        private final String searchId;\n        private final String keyword;\n        private final List<Entity> results;\n        private final long searchDuration;\n        \n        public AdvancedSearchResult(String searchId, String keyword, \n                                   List<Entity> results, long searchDuration) {\n            this.searchId = searchId;\n            this.keyword = keyword;\n            this.results = results != null ? results : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.searchDuration = searchDuration;\n        }\n        \n        public String getSearchId() { return searchId; }\n        public String getKeyword() { return keyword; }\n        public List<Entity> getResults() { return results; }\n        public long getSearchDuration() { return searchDuration; }\n        \n        @Override\n        public String toString() {\n            return "搜索ID: " + searchId + \n                   ", 关键词: \\"" + keyword + "\\", " +\n                   "结果数: " + results.size() + ", " +\n                   "搜索耗时: " + searchDuration + "ms";\n        }\n    }\n}'}, {'role': 'assistant', 'content':      int teachingCount = getAllTeachingEntities().size();\n        int addressCount = getAllAddressEntities().size();\n        int userCount = getAllUserEntities().size();\n        int totalCount = classCount + teachingCount + addressCount + userCount;\n        \n        return String.format(\n            "系统实体统计：班级=%d, 教学=%d, 地址=%d, 用户=%d, 总计=%d",\n            classCount, teachingCount, addressCount, userCount, totalCount\n        );\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 初始化模拟数据\n     * 打印模拟数据加载信息\n     */\n    public void initializeMockData() {\n        System.out.println("模拟数据初始化完成！");\n        System.out.println(getEntityStatistics());\n        System.out.println("模拟数据已准备就绪，可用于搜索测试。");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 根据ID查找特定实体\n     * 在所有实体中查找指定ID的实体\n     * \n     * @param entityId 实体ID\n     * @return 找到的实体，如果未找到则返回null\n     */\n    public Entity findEntityById(String entityId) {\n        if (entityId == null || entityId.isEmpty()) {\n            return null;\n        }\n        \n        // 在所有实体中搜索\n        for (Entity entity : getAllEntities()) {\n            if (entityId.equals(entity.getId())) {\n                return entity;\n            }\n        }\n        \n findEntitiesByName(String name) {\n        List<Entity> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n        if (name == null || name.isEmpty()) {\n            return results;\n        }\n        \n        String lowerName = name.toLowerCase();\n        \n        for (Entity entity : getAllEntities()) {\n            if (entity.getName() != null && entity.getName().toLowerCase().contains(lowerName)) {\n                results.add(entity);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n}'}, {'role': 'assistant', 'content': com.example.entitysearch;\n\nimport java.util.ArrayList;\nimport java.util.List;\n\n/**\n * 搜索服务类\n * 实现对系统中所有实体（班级、教学、地址、用户）的搜索功能\n * 包含搜索逻辑、结果处理和性能优化\n */\npublic class SearchService {\n    \n    private MockData mockData; // 模拟数据实例，用于获取测试数据\n    \n    /**\n     * 构造函数\n     * 初始化搜索服务\n     */\n    public SearchService() {\n        this.mockData = new MockData();\n        System.out.println("搜索服务已初始化，加载模拟数据...");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索所有类型实体\n     * 对系统中的所有实体类型执行搜索，返回匹配的实体列表\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配关键词的所有实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Entity> searchAllEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<Entity> allResults = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n        // 验证关键词有效性\n        if (keyword == null || keyword.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("警告：搜索关键词为空，返回空结果");\n            return allResults;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("开始搜索关键词: \\"" + keyword + "\\"");\n        \n        // 对每种实体类型执行搜索\n        System.out.println("搜索班级实体...");\n        List<ClassEntity> classResults = searchClassEntities(keyword);\n        allResults.addAll(classResults);\n        \n        System.out.println("搜索教学实体...");\n        List<Teaching> teachingResults = searchTeachingEntities(keyword);\n        allResults.addAll(teachingResults);\n        \n        System.out.println("搜索地址实体...");\n        List<Address> addressResults = searchAddressEntities(keyword);\n        allResults.addAll(addressResults);\n        \n        System.out.println("搜索用户实体...");\n        List<User> userResults = searchUserEntities(keyword);\n        allResults.addAll(userResults);\n        \n        System.out.println("搜索完成，共找到 " + allResults.size() + " 个匹配的实体");\n        \n        return allResults;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索班级实体\n     * 在班级实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的班级实体列表\n     */\n    public List<ClassEntity> searchClassEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<ClassEntity> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<ClassEntity> allClasses = mockData.getAllClassEntities();\n        \n        for (ClassEntity classEntity : allClasses) {\n            if (classEntity.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(classEntity);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索教学实体\n     * 在教学实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的教学实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Teaching> searchTeachingEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<Teaching> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<Teaching> allTeachings = mockData.getAllTeachingEntities();\n        \n        for (Teaching teaching : allTeachings) {\n            if (teaching.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(teaching);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索地址实体\n     * 在地址实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的地址实体列表\n     */\n    public List<Address> searchAddressEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<Address> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<Address> allAddresses = mockData.getAllAddressEntities();\n        \n        for (Address address : allAddresses) {\n            if (address.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(address);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 搜索用户实体\n     * 在用户实体中搜索包含关键词的实体\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 匹配的用户实体列表\n     */\n    public List<User> searchUserEntities(String keyword) {\n        List<User> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        List<User> allUsers = mockData.getAllUserEntities();\n        \n        for (User user : allUsers) {\n            if (user.containsKeyword(keyword)) {\n                results.add(user);\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return results;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 按实体类型分组的搜索\n     * 返回按类型分组的搜索结果\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @return 包含按类型分组结果的SearchResult对象\n     */\n    public SearchResult searchEntitiesGrouped(String keyword) {\n        List<ClassEntity> classes = searchClassEntities(keyword);\n        List<Teaching> teachings = searchTeachingEntities(keyword);\n        List<Address> addresses = searchAddressEntities(keyword);\n        List<User> users = searchUserEntities(keyword);\n        \n        return new SearchResult(keyword, classes, teachings, addresses, users);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 高级搜索 - 包含搜索历史记录\n     * 执行搜索并记录搜索历史\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @param adminId 执行搜索的管理员ID\n     * @return 搜索结果和搜索历史ID\n     */\n    public AdvancedSearchResult advancedSearch(String keyword, String adminId) {\n        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();\n        \n        // 执行搜索\n        List<Entity> searchResults = searchAllEntities(keyword);\n        \n        long endTime = System.currentTimeMillis();\n        long searchDuration = endTime - startTime;\n        \n        // 生成搜索历史记录ID\n        String searchId = generateSearchId(keyword, adminId);\n        \n        System.out.println("高级搜索完成 - 搜索ID: " + searchId + \n                          ", 耗时: " + searchDuration + "ms");\n        \n        return new AdvancedSearchResult(searchId, keyword, searchResults, searchDuration);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 生成搜索ID\n     * 基于关键词、管理员ID和时间戳生成唯一搜索ID\n     * \n     * @param keyword 搜索关键词\n     * @param adminId 管理员ID\n     * @return 生成的搜索ID\n     */\n    private String generateSearchId(String keyword, String adminId) {\n        String timestamp = String.valueOf(System.currentTimeMillis());\n        String keywordHash = String.valueOf(Math.abs(keyword.hashCode() % 10000));\n        \n        return "SRCH-" + adminId + "-" + keywordHash + "-" + timestamp.substring(timestamp.length() - 6);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 验证搜索权限\n     * 检查管理员是否有权限执行搜索\n     * \n     * @param adminId 管理员ID\n     * @return 如果有权限返回true，否则返回false\n     */\n    public boolean validateSearchPermission(String adminId) {\n        // 模拟权限检查逻辑\n        if (adminId == null || adminId.isEmpty()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // 在实际系统中，这里会调用权限服务进行检查\n        return adminId.startsWith("ADMIN-");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 清理搜索缓存\n     * 该方法可以用于清理搜索缓存或重置搜索状态\n     */\n    public void clearSearchCache() {\n        System.out.println("搜索缓存已清理");\n        // 在实际系统中，这里会清理缓存或重置状态\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 内部类：搜索结果包装类\n     * 用于返回按类型分组的搜索结果\n     */\n    public static class SearchResult {\n        private final String keyword;\n        private final List<ClassEntity> classes;\n        private final List<Teaching> teachings;\n        private final List<Address> addresses;\n        private final List<User> users;\n        \n        public SearchResult(String keyword, List<ClassEntity> classes, \n                          List<Teaching> teachings, List<Address> addresses, \n                          List<User> users) {\n            this.keyword = keyword;\n            this.classes = classes != null ? classes : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.teachings = teachings != null ? teachings : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.addresses = addresses != null ? addresses : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.users = users != null ? users : new ArrayList<>();\n        }\n        \n        public String getKeyword() { return keyword; }\n        public List<ClassEntity> getClasses() { return classes; }\n        public List<Teaching> getTeachings() { return teachings; }\n        public List<Address> getAddresses() { return addresses; }\n        public List<User> getUsers() { return users; }\n        \n        public int getTotalCount() {\n            return classes.size() + teachings.size() + addresses.size() + users.size();\n        }\n        \n        @Override\n        public String toString() {\n            return "搜索关键词: \\"" + keyword + "\\", " +\n                   "班级: " + classes.size() + ", " +\n                   "教学: " + teachings.size() + ", " +\n                   "地址: " + addresses.size() + ", " +\n                   "用户: " + users.size() + ", " +\n                   "总计: " + getTotalCount();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * 内部类：高级搜索结果\n     * 包含搜索元数据，如搜索ID和搜索时长\n     */\n    public static class AdvancedSearchResult {\n        private final String searchId;\n        private final String keyword;\n        private final List<Entity> results;\n        private final long searchDuration;\n        \n        public AdvancedSearchResult(String searchId, String keyword, \n                                   List<Entity> results, long searchDuration) {\n            this.searchId = searchId;\n            this.keyword = keyword;\n            this.results = results != null ? results : new ArrayList<>();\n            this.searchDuration = searchDuration;\n        }\n        \n        public String getSearchId() { return searchId; }\n        public String getKeyword() { return keyword; }\n        public List<Entity> getResults() { return results; }\n        public long getSearchDuration() { return searchDuration; }\n        \n                  "搜索耗时: " + searchDuration + "ms";\n        }\n    }\n}'}, {'role': 'assistant', 'content': findEntitiesByName(String name) {\n        List<Entity> results = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n        if (name == null || name.isEmpty()) {\n            return results;\n        }\n        \n        String lowerName = name.toLowerCase();\n        \n        for (Entity entity : getAllEntities()) {\n            if (entity.getName() != null && entity.getName().toLowerCase().contains(lowerName)) {\n If the requirement is developing a software, game, app, or website, excluding the above data-related tasks, you should decompose the requirement into multiple tasks and assign them to different team members based on their expertise. The standard software development process has four steps: creating a Product Requirement Document (PRD) by the Product Manager -> writing a System Design by the Architect -> creating tasks by the Project Manager -> and coding by the Engineer. You may choose to execute any of these steps. When publishing message to Product Manager, you should directly copy the full original user requirement.\n2.1. If the requirement contains both DATA-RELATED part mentioned in 1 and software development part mentioned in 2, you should decompose the software development part and assign them to different team members based on their expertise, and assign the DATA-RELATED part to Data Analyst David directly.\n2.2. For software development requirement, estimate the complexity of the requirement before assignment, following the common industry practice of t-shirt sizing:\n - XS: snake game, static personal homepage, basic calculator app\n - S: Basic photo gallery, basic file upload system, basic feedback form\n - M: Offline menu ordering system, news aggregator app\n - L: Online booking system, inventory management system\n - XL: Social media platform, e-commerce app, real-time multiplayer game\n - For XS and S requirements, you don\'t need the standard software development process, you may directly ask Engineer to write the code. Otherwise, estimate if any part of the standard software development process may contribute to a better final code.
